name: Add new GetResponse contacts to Zoho CRM (if the contact already exists in Zoho CRM, send a message in Slack instead of adding the contact to Zoho CRM)
description: Every time a new contact is added to GetResponse CRM, Make will automatically check if the contact already exists in Zoho CRM. If not, it will create a new contact in Zoho CRM. If yes, Make will automatically send a message in Slack.
